channel.title: Reset when line = null
channel.description:
Hey can someone give me the command so that when the line = null on my server it resets because about every 4 hours my server gets this and says [code] null null null [/code] And lags the server Note:Im using deltascape source and i have to reset my server just to stop it and i was thinking if there is a code that if line = null then reset?
Please give me the code and where to place it thanks

item.title: Reset when line = null

item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Hey can someone give me the command so that when the line = null on my server it resets because about every 4 hours my server gets this
and says

null 
null
null

And lags the server
Note:Im using deltascape source
and i have to reset my server just to stop it and i was thinking if there is a code that if line = null then reset?

Please give me the code and where to place it thanks
